page.title: 12DUNSTON -PLACES TO GO
page.content: Most people thought there was not enough for children and teenagers to do.They think "That the{Sports Centre {and library}which will open in 1986 are good ideas because they will give the young people somewhere to go ,if it is not vandalised."The Dancing Teacher does not want the new centre because{"It will be more expensive to {hire."}People would hope to see keep fit, slimming and music classes. A few people thought that there should be a{cinema. Some people felt the building of the Tower Block{(Derwent Tower )}to be un-necessary.They suggested tht it was "Not a nice place to live ."They did however think the new houses are an improvement for "Each new house has a garden of it's own."
